item.description:
Happy New Year!

To kick off 2008, we?re going to utilize a series of NLP techniques that have to do with time travel and goal-setting:
? We?ll start with a guided Trans-Derivational search (review) of 2007, gathering up lessons learned in the past year.
? We?ll use those learnings to generate Well-Formed Outcomes (can?t-miss goals) for 2008.
? We?ll then ?Walk our Timelines? for 2008 to see more clearly how our well-formed outcomes come into reality in the coming year.
? Finally (if we have time), we?ll use Circles of Excellence to give ourselves access to the internal resources that will be most useful to us in 2008.

This will be a great opportunity to learn (or review) a highly useful set of NLP techniques, while accomplishing some important planning for yourself for the coming year.

A new feature for this meeting: we?ll be starting the meeting at 6:30 for those new to NLP, and those who want to come early to socialize/network. At 7pm we?ll get rolling with the main events for the evening.

Everyone is welcome to this meetup, from beginners to experts. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions about the group in general or this meeting in particular.

I?m looking forward to seeing you there!
Adam.

PS A reminder about the venue:
Andover-Newton Theological School is conveniently located in Newton Center, with free parking. You can get directions here:
http://ants.edu/about...
Here is a map of the campus:
http://ants.edu/about...
Please note that this location is NOT handicapped accessible, as it entails climbing a short flight of stairs.

Adam Marx
NLP Master Practitioner
New Light NLP
"Helping you to become the you that you want to be"
Coaching, Counseling, and Training
adam@NewLightNLP.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston Neuro Linguistic Programming January Meetup
